title: MECHANICAL
description: Welcome to rapid development of high-quality mechanical products, from 3D sketches to fully detailed industrial assemblies. Gain insight into key factors of quality and performance early in the product development phase. Virtually create and analyze a mechanical product in its operating environment with extended product development teams.

title: SHAPE & STYLE
description:
Create organic looking shapes using subdivision modeling technology anywhere and anytime. 3D Sculptor offers everything needed to create great organic shapes using subdivision modeling technology.
Enhanced interoperability with 3DEXPERIENCE Platform 3D Design apps and SOLIDWORKS.Stop worrying about installs and updates : with a cloud-based solution you always benefit from latest versions of 3D Sculptor on all your devices.

title: EQUIPMENT SYSTEMS
description:
Multidisciplinary equipment design, experience and manufacturing :
  • Electrical systems with associated wire harnesses, cable systems, electrical components and rigid-flexible printed circuit boards.
  • Fluid systems provides a powerful specification driven design environment that integrates your company know-how into the detailed design process.
  • Steel and Equipment layout from concept to detailed structural design.
  • Fastener engineering simplifying the design and management of complex fastened assemblies.

title: AUTOMATED DESIGN & ENGINEERING
description: A complete and sophisticated set of applications built for creating, applying and deploying knowledge management rules within your product design and innovation process.

title: SOLIDWORKS USERS
description:
Dramatically improve the way you develop and manufacture products.

As the foundation for the entire SOLIDWORKS 3DEXPERIENCE suite of product development solutions, the 3DEXPERIENCE Platform provides unique ways to ensure successful collaboration within the ecosystem through secure and safe communities, complete design and file access control, sharing, light weight visualization, and product review in addtion to best in class design, simulation, cost estimation, manufacturability checks, CAM, sustainable design, and data management.

title: STRUCTURE
description: Simulation value for product engineers and designers who need application-focused solutions. Provide fast insight and direction to answer key performance questions for product innovation. Intuitive guided workflow including: Linear Static, Buckling, Frequency and steady state Thermal.

title: COMPUTATIONAL FLUID DYNAMICS
description: Advanced computational fluid dynamics to address a broad range of nonlinear coupled fluid-thermal and fluid-structural problems : Laminar and turbulent flow, aerodynamics, aeroacoustic & Thermal convective.

title: PLASTIC INJECTION
description: Evaluate and improve plastic part and mold tooling designs by simulating the filling and packing process and the mold"s cooling system. Predicts common molding defects including, weld-lines, sink marks, air traps and incomplete filling and well as required injection pressures and tool clamping forces.

title: ELECTRO-MAGNETIC
description: Design, analyze and optimize electromagnetic components and systems. This includes the performance and efficiency of antennas and filters, electromagnetic compatibility and interference, exposure of the human body to EM fields, electro-mechanical effects in motors and generators, and thermal effects in high-power devices.

title: SIMULATION PROCESS DEFINE & EXECUTION
description: Assess the integrity of products under a wide range of loading conditions to guide decisions on product performance and quality. Provide Product Development, Mechanical, Design, and Simulation Engineers the powerful and intuitive tools needed to perform sophisticated structural simulations.

title: SIMULATION REVIEW
description: Assess the integrity of products under a wide range of loading conditions to guide decisions on product performance and quality. Provide Product Development, Mechanical, Design, and Simulation Engineers the powerful and intuitive tools needed to perform sophisticated structural simulations.

title: SCHEDULING & OPERATIONS
description:
Go beyond just production and meet customer demands On-Time, Every-Time

Real time scheduling update from events occurring throughout the supply chain help you quickly and efficiently adopt to fluctuations in customer demands and meet delivery requirements.
  • Demand driven, on-time delivery
  • Accurate and timely production planning
  • Optimized use of available resources (material, labor, equipment, etc.)
